summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily between Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby regarding scheduling a meeting with Paul Morris and others at Jeffrey Epstein's residence. The emails discuss potential times for the meeting and the attendees involved.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting at Jeffrey Epstein's home and is communicating with Amanda Kirby about scheduling.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling the meeting and is confirming details with Lesley Groff.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as bringing two individuals to the meeting, indicating his involvement.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is identified as the Head of the Key Clients Partners Group and is attending the meeting with Paul Morris.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is mentioned as a Director in the Key Clients Partners Group and is attending the meeting with Paul Morris.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting together.
Paul Morris is bringing Caroline Kitidis to the meeting, indicating a professional relationship.
Paul Morris is bringing Tazia Smith to the meeting, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: Meeting at Jeffrey Epstein's Home
events.description: A meeting is scheduled to take place at Jeffrey Epstein's residence with various attendees.

keyFacts: The meeting is scheduled for September 6, 2013, from 1-3 PM.
Lesley Groff is coordinating the meeting and confirming details with Amanda Kirby.
Paul Morris will be bringing Caroline Kitidis and Tazia Smith to the meeting.
